title: Book excerpt: ‘The Art of Cycling’ by James Hibbard
content:
This extract from 'Philosophy, Meaning, and a Life on Two Wheels' looks at U.S. Postal, Ineos Grenadiers, Heidegger, and the pursuit of victory.

Read the full article at Book excerpt: ‘The Art of Cycling’ by James Hibbard on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
